title: Introducing: Grace Mitchell
body:
Yet another teenage wonderkid, sixteen year old **Grace Mitchell** channels the spirit of her namesake (Joni) Mitchell, alongside the likes of Lana Del Rey and Ellie Goulding on her debut tracks, _Your Design_ and _Broken Over You_, two lustfully elegant slices of bold, extravagant pop.

Dropping Your Design yesterday, it immediately fell onto the radars of [Pigeons & Planes](http://pigeonsandplanes.com/2014/08/daily-discovery-grace-mitchell/) and [Disco Naïveté](http://disconaivete.com/post/95211393981), and there’s no doubting that her songs will continue to grow from here. There’s a startling maturity to her music, in both composition and lyrical make-up, that in truth, raise her well above the vast majority of her contemporaries. Check out both tracks below.
